document.full_text: garrison keillor, host of long-running radio show "a prairie home companion", says he is planning to retire in 2013 but hasn't yet come to terms with making any firm decision.
document.title: garrison keillor planning to retire in 2013
lines_and_colors: garrison keillor, host of long-running radio show "a prairie home companion", says he is planning to retire in 2013 but hasn't yet come to terms with making any firm decision.
